name: add logo
desc: The add_logo module is used to place a logo or other graphic object in the Viewer's non-transformable overlay.

properties.name: Logo Image File
properties.desc: The Image file to be used for the logo.

properties.name: Visible
properties.desc: Controls the visibility of the object.

properties.name: Logo Size
properties.desc: The Logo Size will change both the width and height of the image in overlay space.

properties.name: Horizontal Translation
properties.desc: The Horizontal Translation shifts the logo in the horizontal direction in the overlay space.

properties.name: Vertical Translation
properties.desc: The Vertical Translation shifts the logo in the horizontal direction in the overlay space.

properties.name: Overlay
properties.desc: The Overlay control allows the user to put the logo behind the model or in front of it.

properties.name: Mask Image
properties.desc: The Mask Image will set the opacity of all pixels with the same color as the Mask color to zero.

properties.name: Mask Color
properties.desc: When Mask Image is used the Mask Color is the color used to select pixels to be masked.
